statements: SELECT * FROM products
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_price > 50
SELECT product_name, product_quantity FROM products WHERE product_quantity <= 10
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY product_price DESC
SELECT product_name, product_quantity FROM products WHERE product_price BETWEEN 20 AND 50
SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_price > 50 ORDER BY product_price DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM products WHERE product_quantity > 10 LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_quantity BETWEEN 5 AND 10;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_quantity < 5 OR product_price > 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC, product_price DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, product_quantity FROM products WHERE product_name LIKE '%apple%' AND product_price < 50;
SELECT product_name, description, price FROM products;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 100;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity, price FROM products WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT sale_date, quantity_sold, total_price FROM sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC, total_price ASC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT * FROM products WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY product_id DESC
SELECT product_id, product_name, description FROM products WHERE product_id < 10 ORDER BY product_id
SELECT sale_id, product_id, sale_date, total_price FROM sales WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY sale_date DESC
SELECT product_name, price, quantity FROM products LEFT JOIN sales ON products.product_id = sales.product_id WHERE quantity_sold > 0 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT sale_date, total_amount FROM sales WHERE sale_quantity > 5 ORDER BY total_amount ASC;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM inventory WHERE unit_price BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY product_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE unit_price > 50;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE LENGTH(phone_number) > 10;
SELECT product_name, quantity, unit_price FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 50 ORDER BY unit_price ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT * FROM Products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE price > 100;
SELECT * FROM Inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT c.customer_name, s.sale_date, p.product_name FROM Customers c JOIN Sales s ON c.customer_id = s.customer_id JOIN Products p ON s.product_id = p.product_id;
SELECT * FROM Products;
SELECT product_name, product_category FROM Products WHERE price > 100;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM Inventory JOIN Products ON Inventory.product_id = Products.product_id;
SELECT Customers.customer_name, Sales.quantity, Sales.sale_date FROM Customers JOIN Sales ON Customers.customer_id = Sales.customer_id ORDER BY Sales.sale_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT product_name, price FROM inventory WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name;
SELECT transaction_id, payment_method FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY transaction_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity, price FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%'
SELECT supplier_name, email, phone_number FROM suppliers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%'
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, quantity_sold, total_price FROM sales WHERE total_price > 1000 ORDER BY sale_date ASC
SELECT transaction_date, payment_method, customer_name FROM transactions JOIN customers ON transactions.customer_id = customers.customer_id
